title: Certara R Packages
text: Certara.R provides collection R packages Shiny applications designed Pharmacometric workflows R. Shiny applications provide ability generate R code given point--click operations, enabling reproducible extensible workflow Shiny GUI RStudio.

title: Certara R Packages
text: Certara.RsNLME uses tidyverse syntax build Non-Linear-Mixed-Effects (NLME) models R. Create execute NLME models using built-R functions.

title: Certara R Packages
text: Certara.RsNLME.ModelBuilder R package Shiny application used build RsNLME model. Use GUI select various model building options observe PML update real time. Additionally, users may generate corresponding RsNLME code learn reproduce model object R.

title: Certara R Packages
text: Certara.RsNLME.ModelExecutor R package Shiny application used execute RsNLME model. Use GUI add additional output tables, specify engine parameters, select various run types, !

title: Certara R Packages
text: Certara.ModelResults R package Shiny GUI used generate, customize, report model diagnostic plots tables NLME NONMEM runs. Users limited GUI however, Certara.ModelResults generate underlying flextable xpose/ggplot2 code (.R /.Rmd) inside Shiny application, can use recreate plot table objects R, ensuring reproducibility trace-ability model diagnostics reporting output.

title: Certara R Packages
text: Certara.Xpose.NLME R package used creates xpose databases (xpose_data) PML/NLME results. Additionally, Certara.Xpose.NLME offers various covariate model diagnostic functions, available xpose package.

title: Certara R Packages
text: Certara.VPCResults R package Shiny application used parameterize plot Visual Predictive Check (VPC). Use GUI select various binning binless methods specify options censoring, stratification, prediction-corrected. Users limited GUI however, Certara.VPCResults generate underlying tidyvpc ggplot2 code (.R /.Rmd) inside Shiny application, can use recreate plot table objects R, ensuring reproducibility VPC’s reporting output.

title: Certara R Packages
text: tidyvpc package used perform Visual Predictive Check (VPC), accounting stratification, censoring, prediction correction. Using piping ‘magrittr’, intuitive syntax gives users flexible powerful method generate VPCs using traditional binning new binless approach Jamsen et al. (2018) doi:10.1002/psp4.12319 Additive Quantile Regression (AQR) Locally Estimated Scatterplot Smoothing (LOESS) prediction correction.

title: Install Certara packages — install_certara_packages
code: install_certara_packages(   CRAN_repo = "https://cloud.r-project.org",   clean_install = FALSE,   quiet = FALSE )

title: Install Certara packages — install_certara_packages
text: CRAN_repo Character;  URL CRAN mirror defaults "https://cloud.r-project.org" clean_install Logical; Set TRUE remove existing Certara packages prior installing quiet Logical; Set TRUE suppress installation messages reduce console output
